extendedInfo.description: EEBA is a personal/household finance app for money management and budget tracking. (Registration required for sync feature)Stay on budget with virtual envelopes! EEBA, the Easy Envelope Budget Aid keeps you on track! ** Leading online envelope budgeting tool on Android featured by Google, About.com, and Lifehacker ** ** NOTE: If you have questions or support issues, contact us at support@eebacanhelp.com! We'll get back to you ASAP! *** Automagically syncs 2+ phones + web! Share a budget!* Your data is automatically backed up to EEBA's site. Never lose your data due to faulty app update or user error.* Expense tracking optimized for speed!* Auto-complete and auto-category picking for payees* Check envelope balances & budget on-the-go* Split transactions* Proven cash budgeting method* Location-based widget! Enter common transactions in exactly 3 touches. Control in Settings. (Note: widget will not be available if you move app to SD due to Android limitation)* Detailed reports: by expense, by month, vs. budget, by payee, by location (on the mobile website)* Download transactions to CSV (on website)Ad-free, Free Forever version includes 10 regular budgeting envelopes & 10 annual/irregular envelopes.  It's great as a basic budget tracker.  Enjoy!==============================Subscribers Get More Features!==============================Track your bank balances in addition to envelope balances!* Checkbook register including cleared balance and reconciliation* Bill reminder / scheduled expenses / recurring transactions.* Bank account statement import. Import your transactions in QFX (Quicken) and OFX (Microsoft Money) formats with auto-matching to manually entered transactions.* Compare to envelope budgeting systems that cost more and have no Android app.If you're looking to track expenses, or for a checkbook ledger, budget tracker, expense tracker, budget planner, or personal financial app, try us out!You can keep a budget. EEBA can help!Features, bugs? Please email us! We're happy to help!

reviews.title: Useful if a little complex
reviews.comment: Have used this for a few months now and it seems to tick most of our boxes. A few minor faults such as initially a little complex to use and balancing across weeks is not particularly easy. But I suspect this is more low user IQ than a fault with the tool.
reviews.author: Richard White

reviews.title: Love it :)
reviews.comment: I\'m working through the Total Money Makeover and it recommends envelopes to help budget... this lets me have the envelopes wherever I go without the fuss of going to the bank to actually get the cash. Quite user friendly, simple and functional.
reviews.author: Carrie Germain

reviews.title: best budget app ever
reviews.comment: i have downloaded finance apps where you have to give your personal banking info, which you definitely shouldn\'t give out! This app you have the option to not give that info. My husband and I are able to update our spending habbits and see the charts through their online website. Best budget app ever! you can even see online the percentage of each specific budget you are spendin. very hepful!
reviews.author: Angelica Murphy

reviews.title: Great app!
reviews.comment: We are using the app to track our spending and implement an envelope system as part of our Financial Peace University class. The best part is the app is FREE!
reviews.author: Janice Severt

reviews.title: UI needs update
reviews.comment: i am a plus user for over 2 years now, and eeba has been very helpful. but i since i started, the UI and even the widget did not change (looks ugly on android 4.0+). i hope the app developers can update their UI and widget
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: A great app if you commit to it
reviews.comment: This app takes some work on your part to make sure that you keep income/expenses balanced with your bank acc, but it is definitely worth it. For the first time I\'m not stressing about upcoming bills or unexpected payments- I can see where my money is, and what it is earmarked for. I even have savings now!
reviews.author: A Kin

reviews.title: Super helpful
reviews.comment: This a great app. Exactly what I needed to manage my money better. Love the ability to see my spending cash while putting money away for bills.
reviews.author: Jazmin Naranjo

reviews.title: Excellent budgeting app!
reviews.comment: As a college student, I\'m still learning the ropes of budgeting and I don\'t have much money to work with, but this app has been a GREAT help to me in keeping track of spending. I highly recommend!
reviews.author: Tori Dagg

reviews.title: Awesome.
reviews.comment: Great app to easily keep expenses tracked on the move. Best of all works to keep me on budget!   Well done and thanks
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Awesome!!
reviews.comment: we have been using paper envelopes for ever and this app has made life so much easier! I always have my phone with me so all transactions can automatically be entered and I can see at a glance exactly where we stand financially! My new favorite app!
reviews.author: Faith Hess

reviews.title: Great App!
reviews.comment: EEBA is an awesome app that will help anyone who doesn\'t want to have several envelopes sitting around wth cash in them, but wants to use the same process for managing money. I would rather have seen an option to buy the app for a set cost rather than a subscription that includes a recurring cost, but seems like a good business strategy to set it up the way they did. As a result, I now have an envelope for my EEBA subscription. Well played, EEBA.
reviews.author: Dan Simon

reviews.title: Living w/i our budget!
reviews.comment: Great app! Helped us dig out of the \"hole\". You have to be faithful to enter your data for it to work.
reviews.author: Kathleen Busch

reviews.title: Very good app
reviews.comment: Really helpfull application for financial planning and management. What I like the most is that you can keep several subaccounts into your main account and rollover money easily in all of them. Having your transactions saved on their server is very useful if you have to wipe data from your phone as in a factory reset for example
reviews.author: Vlad Pitigoi

reviews.title: Perfect for me
reviews.comment: Tried many other budget apps and this one does everything I want it to, even syncs online so if I change devices all my data is saved and restored, easy to use.
reviews.author: Bryan Richards

reviews.title: Ease of use is fantastic!
reviews.comment: EEBA has some great features that allow you to easily add money to your accounts every 2 weeks or month and it is super fast to add in some transactions for purchases!
reviews.author: Mitchell Brown

reviews.title: Simple & Awesome
reviews.comment: Very useful application for simple tracking. My wife and I both have this app on our phones and it helps us communicate in real time how much money we have for each categorized envelope. Love it!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great App
reviews.comment: Really helps me keep track of my money!  I recommend this app to anyone who is trying to get a hold of their finances.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Love it
reviews.comment: Very user friendly and great customer service. I have had 2 questions and both were answered promptly and correctly. Ready now to get on track in 2013
reviews.author: Tena Godin

reviews.title: Just what I needed
reviews.comment: This app is sooo easy to use and gives all the details that are needed to plan a simple expenses tracking... I am sooo happy with it I had to give a review. :)
reviews.author: Keshini Hapugoda

reviews.title: Simple to use
reviews.comment: Serves it\'s purpose well, simple concept, easy to use. One easily gets into the habit of being conscious about transactions and recording them regularly.
reviews.author: Dharav Solanki
